bookmarks.description: Link to bookmarks page from navigation bar

bookmarked.description: Link to bookmarks page from user profile menu

copyCode.description: Copy all code button for code markdown

lastModified.description: Text before last edit timestamp in forum posts

optionsLink.description: Link to options page in user dropdown menu. Probably no translation needed? Decide depending on language

editCommunity.description: Link to community settings in user dropdown menu

editForum.description: Link to forum settings in user dropdown menu

smile_o.description: Title of formatting item for emote picker

window_minimize.description: Title of formatting item horizontal rule

code.description: Title of formatting item inline code

file_code_o.description: Title of formatting item code block

list_ol.description: Title of formatting item numbered list

dragText.description: Hover text when on a draggable area

advancedFormatting.description: Options: Title of advanced formatting mod

advancedFormattingDesc.message: Adds an emote picker, extra formatting buttons & allows you to drag to re-order the formatting toolbar when editing your forum posts.
advancedFormattingDesc.description: Options: Description of the advanced formatting mod

hideHeader.description: Options: Title of auto-hide header on scroll mod

hideHeaderDesc.message: Hides the header when you scroll down, shows it when you scroll up.
hideHeaderDesc.description: Options: Description of auto-hide header on scroll mod

navbookmarks.description: Options: Title of bookmarks in navigation mod

navbookmarksDesc.message: Displays a link to the bookmarks page in the main navigation, for easy access.
navbookmarksDesc.description: Options: Description of bookmarks in navigation mod

compactHeader.description: Options: Title of compact header mod

compactHeaderDesc.message: Sets the header to its original height and removes redundant links.
compactHeaderDesc.description: Options: Description of compact header mod

customNotification.description: Options: Title of custom notification icons mod

customNotificationDesc.message: Displays additional font icons in the header's notification dropdown, to quickly distinguish one type of notification from another.
customNotificationDesc.description: Options: Description of custom notification icons mod

hideTooltips.description: Options: Title of hide tooltips mod

hideTooltipsDesc.message: Hides header and navigation bar tooltips.
hideTooltipsDesc.description: Options: Description of hide tooltips mod

hideUnread.description: Options: Title of hide unread count mod

hideUnreadDesc.message: Hides the unread count icon in the navigation bar.
hideUnreadDesc.description: Options: Description of unread count mod

timestamp.description: Options: Title of last edit timestamp mod

timestampDesc.message: Displays the time of last edit in local time on bottom of edited posts.
timestampDesc.description: Options: Description of last edit timestamp mod

showUID.description: Options: Title of show user IDs mod

showUIDDesc.message: Shows UIDs when hovering the username at top of a post and when hovering a user's avatar on their profile.
showUIDDesc.description: Options: Description of show user IDs mod

signatureModDesc.message: Hides all signatures and replaces each with a button. When clicked, the signature of individual posts will be displayed.

squareAvatars.description: Options: Title of square avatars mod

squareAvatarsDesc.description: Options: Description of square avatars mod

save.description: Options: Text to show on a button that performs some sort of save operation

backup.description: Options: Text to show on a button that performs some sort of backup operation

reset.description: Options: Text to show on a button that performs some sort of reset operation
